text:
Namaste Friends,
I am a solopreneur and I launched Riju which is a super simple alternative to Microsoft PowerPoint, could you please support me by upvoting it on Product Hunt?â€¦ <https://www.producthunt.com/posts/riju>

Hi everyone!
We've just upgraded our plan to CMS Enterprise and are interested in building a few webapps, does anyone have any cool ones they have built that I can draw inspo from so we can see what is possible to be done? TIA!
